name: Rouge G Refillable Lipstick
about: What it is: The iconic Rouge G design has been modernised with an array of customisable jewel cases that can be refilled as desired...Formulation Type: Lipstick..Highlighted Ingredients:.-Lily flower and sweet almond oil: Smoothing, hydrating and plumping...Ingredient Callouts: It comes in recyclable packaging. It is also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Rouge G has been reinvented in a radiant golden adornment revealing its secret double mirror. Customizable and refillable at will, Rouge G cases come in an array of designs, showcasing Guerlain's know-how and commitment...Research Results:.ROUGE G VELVET:.-Instantly softened, lips are hydrated and 45% smoother³, for 16-hour comfort⁴..-After 4 weeks, their regeneration is optimised by 37%⁵..-Lips are visibly plumped and shaped; they are more beautiful day after day, even without make-up...ROUGE G SATIN:.-Instantly softened, lips are 46% more hydrated⁶, 49% plumper⁷ and 53% smoother⁷..-After 4 weeks, lips’ regeneration has increased by 23%⁸, they are smoothed, shaped and plumped, even without make-up...³Clinical test on 25 subjects..⁴Self-scoring on 32 subjects..⁵Dermatological clinical test on 30 subjects..⁶Instrumental test on 32 subjects..⁷Clinical test on 25 subjects..⁸Dermatological clinical test on 33 subjects...The weight of this jewel case has been reduced by 19% and its manufacturing process optimised, allowing a 30% reduction in CO2 emissions compared to the previous generation of Rouge G cases...Refill Product Instructions:.-For your first Rouge G purchase, choose a shade and a case to create your complete lipstick..-For the following ones, refill the shade or change the case as you wish..Disclaimer: The new Rouge G cases are only compatible with the new-generation refills and vice versa..
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:..Customise your lipstick in 2 steps:.-For your first Rouge G purchase, choose a shade and a case to create your complete lipstick. .-For the following ones, refill the shade or change the case as you wish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had previously bought the shade 518, le rose blush, but was not satisfied with it so I bought this shade instead and I cannot be happier ! This shade is very flattering on my skin. The case and the whole product also feels very luxurious to hold.
